slides.title: QR-Based Time Tracking System
slides.content: A modern solution for efficient time management using QR codes.

slides.title: Introduction
slides.content: Time tracking is essential for business efficiency. Our QR-based solution streamlines the process, improving accuracy and tracking in real-time.

slides.title: How It Works
slides.content: Employees scan the QR code to clock in and out. Data is collected in real-time, allowing managers to track attendance and work hours effortlessly.

slides.title: Cost Savings
slides.content: Implementing our QR-based system can reduce labor costs by 20% through automated timekeeping and minimize human errors that lead to overpayment.

slides.title: Automation Benefits
slides.content: Automation leads to increased productivity, reduced administrative burden, and notifies management of discrepancies immediately.

slides.title: Investment Opportunity
slides.content: Initial investment needed: $100,000. Expected ROI: 150% within the first year due to cuts in labor costs and improved efficiency.

slides.title: Conclusion
slides.content: The QR-based time tracking system is a cost-effective and efficient solution. Join us in revolutionizing time tracking for businesses.
